item.description:
This evening, The Conduit provides a sound healing concert to rebalance the physical, emotional and spiritual bodies. The sounds of gongs and Tibetan bowls vibrate the energy in the chakras and meridians clearing blockages and allowing the life force to flow more freely.

Sound therapy is an excellent way to relieve stress, calm anxiety and alleviate fatigue. For those having trouble resolving issues on the physical plane, the gong sounds create a shift so that individuals can realize their own inner transformational power of healing and transforamtion.

Join The Conduit and others as we meditate with the vibrational sounds of ancient gongs and bowls. A $20 donation goes to support the work of The Conduit and the Growing Green Co-op's healing arts space.

Check www.gongtheplanet.com.
item.name: Vibrational Energy Healing & Ancient Sounds Meditation
